titleStmt.title: The courant out of Italy and Germany &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Veseler [sold by P. Keerius],

notesStmt.note: Parts translated from Broer Jansz's Dutch coranto published 11 September 1621--Cf. Dahl.
Identified as STC 5745 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Bound and filmed with other issues.
